name: jchemistry
short_description:
- Enum containing all elements from periodic table
- Physical, atomic and miscellaneous properties of the elements: atomic radius, boiling temperature, density, thermal conductivity, etc.
- Enum of all 230 space groups
- Class for atom positions, unit cell and reflectors
- Crystallography calculations: plane spacing, diffraction angle, bond angle, bond distance, etc.
- Scattering factors for electrons and x-rays
- Reader and writer of Crystallographic Information File (cif)
summary: Java library for chemistry and crystallography information
